front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA): Common Information Elements

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA)
front.abstract: This standard is intended to promote and facilitate interoperability between components of SIMICA. The standard defines EXPRESS information models and XML schemas that together define the common information elements supporting these interfaces
